mapper.select: SELECT o.order_no, o.order_time, o.delivery_status, o.invoice_number, o.member_id, max(pay.actual_payment_amount) as actualPaymentAmount, max(prod.product_image) as product_image, max(prod.product_name) as product_name, count(d.order_no) as totalOrderCnt FROM products prod inner JOIN detailed_order_items d on prod.product_id = d.product_id inner JOIN payments pay on pay.order_no = d.order_no inner join order_history o on d.order_no = o.order_no where member_id = #{memberId} group by order_no
select count(*) from detailed_order_items where order_no = #{orderNo}

select member_id, name, phone_number, gender, date_of_birth, zip_code, address, detailed_address, email, identity_verification_status, profile_image, refund_bank, refund_account, membership_grade from member where member_id = #{memberId}
SELECT member_id FROM member WHERE member_id = #{memberId}

choose.when: INSERT INTO member(member_id, password, name, phone_number, cell_phone_number, date_of_birth, email, gender) VALUES(#{memberId}, sha1(md5(#{password})), #{name}, #{phoneNumber}, #{cellPhoneNumber}, #{dateOfBirth}, #{email}, #{gender})
INSERT INTO member(member_id, password, name, phone_number, date_of_birth, email, gender) VALUES(#{memberId}, sha1(md5(#{password})), #{name}, #{phoneNumber}, #{dateOfBirth}, #{email}, #{gender})
choose.otherwise: INSERT INTO member(member_id, password, name, cell_phone_number, date_of_birth, email, gender) VALUES(#{memberId}, sha1(md5(#{password})), #{name}, #{cellPhoneNumber}, #{dateOfBirth}, #{email}, #{gender})

mapper.select: SELECT * FROM member WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND password = sha1(md5(#{password}))
